metadata.title: CVE-2022-30550 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
[Privilege escalation possible in dovecot when similar master and non-master passdbs are used]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-30550` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-auth-lua - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-core - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-imapd - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-ldap - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-lucene - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-mysql - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-sieve - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-solr - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
dovecot-submissiond - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dovecot package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1').
